name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 22, the first anniversary of Foxconn Riot 2.0
The entire timeline of Foxconn Riot 2.0 is included on the website.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Tip: Due to a database migration after Musk acquired Twitter, past videos may be prone to lag or even be unable to play completely during playback.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 21, at the Shenzhen Universiade Sports Center, at the World Cup qualifier between China and South Korea, two South Korean female spectators caused a commotion among Chinese fans at the scene because they were holding the South Korean flag. They insulted them and gave them the middle finger.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the same day, a Tottenham fan named Sun Xinghan provoked and argued with Chinese fans in the home fan area. Eventually the staff threw his jersey into the trash can to calm the public anger.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/LMQgv8wXjq

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Forty years later, let alone expressing dissenting opinions, even publishing a piece of news would be considered inciting subversion of the state power.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 20, Zhoukou Vocational College called on students to give the school a five-star rating on Hupu and submit screenshots. So students responded to the call and gave the school one star.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 21, Sichuan Tianfu New Area issued a notice on the adjustment of the old-age allowance, which will be 30 yuan per month for those aged 80-89, 100 yuan per month for those aged 90-99, 1,500 yuan per month for those aged 100-105, and 3,500 yuan per month for those over 110 years old.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 22, in Jinan, Shandong, an electric bike fell off an overpass and killed a courier who was delivering goods under the bridge.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 22, Jilin University required students to install plug-ins on their computers to check the network security status. Moreover, teachers and students from the Information Center checked each student’s computer one by one, directly operating on each student’s computer, without room for negotiation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Jiangxi No. 10 Construction Engineering Co., Ltd. requires employees to sign a "Struggler Commitment Letter", requiring employees to voluntarily give up all paid leave during work, including annual leave, maternity leave, paternity leave, marriage leave, etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 22, Tongliao, Inner Mongolia
A 6-year-old girl was assigned by a kindergarten to clean up the tableware for the entire class for 20 days, and was later expelled from school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Coincidentally, on November 22, Henan University of Science and Technology in Luoyang also required students to install designated terminal security protection software and required students to uninstall other antivirus software.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 20, in Zaoqiang, Hebei, several lawyers were kicked out of the court by the judge for mentioning the topic of torture.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In September this year, Zhengzhou introduced a childcare subsidy system, where families with one, two, and three children could receive subsidies and vacations of 2,000 yuan, 5,000 yuan, and 15,000 yuan respectively. However, two months later, parents complained that they could not apply for subsidies and that childcare leave could not be implemented.
On November 22, the Zhengzhou Municipal Health Commission stated that no detailed rules had been issued, so the subsidies could not be implemented.
Netizens called it a scam.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Fuyang, Anhui Province issued a policy to fully implement paid leave and encourage the implementation of a four-and-a-half-day work week.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 22, Jinan University released a "Study Adaptation Survey" questionnaire to Taiwanese students studying abroad. The questionnaire included questions such as whether they identify with the "Chinese nation", whether they consider themselves Chinese or Taiwanese, whether they agree with "one country, two systems", whether they support the "Anti-Secession Law", and whether they are proud of China's strength.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of November 22, in Chengdu, a Zhongzhi investor was dragged away by the police while defending his rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 22, Liangliang Lijun released a video announcing that they had decided to leave Zhengzhou and return to their hometown.
During the live broadcast, a netizen asked if they would return to Zhengzhou?
They said that they would wait until the house was delivered. They have decided to return home to reclaim wasteland, raise chickens and grow apples. They also said that they are "the first batch of post-90s who returned to their hometown."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, the live broadcast was suddenly interrupted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 22, in Chongqing, Kangde City Phase 3 had been unfinished for several years. The owners finally waited for the handover of the house, but ended up waiting for a dangerous building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 21, in Xishuangbanna, Yunnan, an Agile property project was left unfinished. An owner brought his elderly parents to Agile's sales office to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the recent Chinese Literature Festival, Cai Jun, a member of the Chinese Writers Association, said: "We must work hard to enter a communist society, because communist society provides us with extremely rich material and spiritual resources, so we don't need to be so inward-looking, and there is no question of whether to lie down or not."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Shangbo Pharmaceutical Chemical Factory of Shengquan Group, Zhangqiu District, Jinan, Shandong
Due to the poor laboratory environment and the high-intensity work every day, a man was overwhelmed and suffered from chronic poisoning after working for a year
He was sent to Qilu Hospital for treatment two months ago and died on October 31 due to acidosis.
On November 21, the family members were defending their rights in front of the company, but were beaten by security guards and detained by the police

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In Tianjin, nurses fainted from overwork
It is reported that the Children's Hospital in Tianjin currently receives an average of 13,000 patients per day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/EYKYL7DOXW

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 21, it was reported online that Fangfan Village, Konglong Town, Huangmei County, Huanggang City, Hubei Province, occupied villagers' fertile land and forcibly installed photovoltaic power. In response, staff from the Konglong Town People's Government said that they had signed a contract and there was no forced installation. The county coordinated the work and our town had a task of more than 1,000 acres.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, Liangliang Lijun said that the live broadcast permissions of their two accounts have been blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Previously, Liangliang Lijun had said that her income was not as much as people imagined, and her monthly income was about a few thousand yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 22, Huizhou, Guangdong, Dongming Chemical has been in arrears of wages for half a year. Workers held banners at the company gate to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 21, a truck collided with a train in Huanghua City, Cangzhou City, Hebei Province.
According to the video, a train loaded with goods collided with a train, with one side of the truck leaning against a pole and the other side being the train, on which the words "Canggang" were printed.
As of the time of posting, according to the official department of Huanghua City, no one was injured in the accident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of November 22, a stray dog base in Fengze District, Quanzhou, faced forced demolition.
It is reported that a month ago, a notice was issued saying that the farmland would be restored, and the urban management said that rectification was required. The base had been cooperating with their work. As a result, because the documents from above were not passed, a notice was issued at 12 noon on November 22 saying that it would be moved, and a ticket was issued at 14 o'clock. Forced demolition began at 17 o'clock.
There was no person in charge, no leader, no documents, no law enforcement recorder. 21 urban management officers each held a 1.5-meter iron rod to stop it. Four excavators and a truck drove in and started demolition. The farmland that the base was required to restore to cultivation was all destroyed due to forced demolition. The live broadcast has also been blocked.
There are still more than 200 stray dogs in the base now.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "Take me to ShangHai", November 13, 2022
